Quality Education.reason: The course provides advanced professional knowledge and research capabilities, contributing to quality higher education.
evidence: 習得相關進階專業知識
發展必要的研究能力為學術界貢獻

Reduced Inequalities.reason: The course's focus on "Measurement Equivalence/ Invariance Analysis" in HR can support fair practices, and "social responsibility" broadly relates to reducing disparities.
